response.overview: It's a story of a typical family, composed of father, mother and four children. Christmas is around the corner and the kids as a gift would like to adopt a dog but, despite the opposition of the mother, the father decides to act on his own to make the kids happy. Since that moment the house has become a hell for the mother, who hates the dog. But thanks to the thieves, this difficult cohabitation will turn into a true love.
response.title: The Dog of Christmas
